notes: Revolutionary big-rig styling by Trevor Creed. Motor Trend Truck of the Year 1994. V10 engine for heavy towing. Cummins diesel popular. Quad Cab four-door added 1998. Diesel requires specialized service knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Dodge Ram article, January 2025 revision.

Full-size SUV based on Ram pickup platform. Removable hardtop. Competed with Ford Bronco and Chevrolet Blazer. Production ended US 1993, Mexico 2001. Vintage SUV complexity. Data sourced from Wikipedia Dodge Ramcharger article, January 2025 revision.
